title: The Lost Gold Mine of Idaho Springs: Legend of Sasquatch
description: Two brothers discover a handwritten journal that tells the tale of a vast treasure of gold hidden somewhere high in the mountains. When they set out to find the lost gold mine, their excitement leads to the discovery of more than they bargained for! A predator that isn't supposed to exist! Fear and desperation can make a person do things they would never dream of doing under normal circumstances? Will they make it out of the mountains alive? Enjoy this prelude to Hawthorn Reprisal (First 10 chapters) as a stand alone short story
author: Paul G. Buckner
